Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.virtualView

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.virtualView.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<java.lang.Object>
public class VirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<java.lang.Object>
Yhe virtual view, which acts as a bridge between the controller and the connection to the client

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    VirtualView​(ConnectionToClient connectionToClient, ObservableModel model)
    This is the constructor for the Virtual View The virtual view subscribes to all the events notified by the model and sends messages to its connection to client accordingly to filtering and sending policies

  • Constructor Details

    • VirtualView

      public VirtualView​(ConnectionToClient connectionToClient, ObservableModel model)
      This is the constructor for the Virtual View The virtual view subscribes to all the events notified by the model and sends messages to its connection to client accordingly to filtering and sending policies
      Parameters:
      connectionToClient - the connection to client associated to the virtual view (the association is 1:1)
      model - the observable model to which it subscribes

      Parameters:
      packetFromClient - the packet arriving from the connection
